info.name: AIquila
info.description:
**AIquila** brings [Claude AI](https://www.anthropic.com/claude) capabilities directly into your [Nextcloud](https://nextcloud.com) instance — private, self-hosted, and under your control.
> **Early Release** — This app is under active development. Features and APIs may change. Feedback and contributions are welcome.
### Features
- **Chat** — Converse with Claude about your files and documents - **Summarize** — Generate concise summaries of any document - **Create & Edit** — Draft, rewrite, and refine content with AI assistance - **Text Tools** — Spellcheck, rephrase, and improve your writing
### Resources
- [Documentation](https://github.com/elgorro/aiquila/blob/main/docs/README.md) - [Source Code](https://github.com/elgorro/aiquila) - [Report Issues](https://github.com/elgorro/aiquila/issues) - [Discussions](https://github.com/elgorro/aiquila/discussions)
